name: Deltastar
description:
Deltastar

In Deltastar you have to shoot the oncoming Enemys, they are not your friends. So its better if you keep moving and shooting! 

Dont stop moving!!

This game was made for the Pxl Game Jam 3 (https://itch.io/jam/pxl-game-jam-3) 

Controls

LMB: Move your Ship to the Mouse position

Space: Shoot

Credits
  • Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/VT323#standard-styles
  • Background music: https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop
  • Sound effects: jsfxr
